mapper.update: update t_wms_outboundbase set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTBOUNDNO = #{outboundno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTBOUNDPLANTIME = #{outboundplantime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OUTBOUNDTIME = #{outboundtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, OUTBOUNDTYPE = #{outboundtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OUTBOUNDNO, OUTBOUNDPLANTIME, OUTBOUNDTIME, STATUS, OUTBOUNDTYPE, REMARK from t_wms_outboundbase where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, OUTBOUNDNO, OUTBOUNDPLANTIME, OUTBOUNDTIME, STATUS, OUTBOUNDTYPE, REMARK from t_wms_outboundbase
